title: What's the deal with Death Sworn Katarina?!
body:
After so many positive changes to the skin why would you ruin its SFX right after the skin was considered finished?
Before the PBE update which involved the skins splash art i considered its SFX to be perfect. You added SFX to her Passive when she gets a reset, you made the dagger pickup and R SFX better. So why would you just ruin it right as the feedback thread for the skin closes?

The skin no longer has any SFX on her resets and R and you can barely hear any sound when she picks up a dagger. And sadly, it doesn't seem to be a bug as i myself and many others pointed out on the PBE boards that she's missing her SFX.
What kind of dumb decision making is this? You just lost a customer for the skin.

replies.body: Hey Daunt, sorry about those! Those sounds you mentioned are still there for Kat and there will be a fix to the volumes (mainly R). I was getting a lot of complaints that it was too harsh/loud and overcorrected. Changes were made after the cutoff time for PBE transitioning, so I'll have to double check when it actually releases out to live servers.
Make it loud and spicy so it feels like it does damage
haha the Kat VGU sound designer helped me look at it so she's volume balanced against more accurately!

If I might have your ear for a moment?

Would it be possible to do something about Maokai's Q and E SFX as well?

When they hit one target, it's all fine and dandy. The problem comes up when the games plays the 'Hit" sound effect.... for every target hit. I can understand why it happens like this. Q is an ability that has a missile speed that goes through targets, so it plays the sound for each new one struck. E on the other hand, while the Sapling Toss and Sapling Chase sounds are fine, the problem arises when it explodes and applies it's effects to targets under the effect of the spell's Brush bonus. It sounds like (at least on my end) that the SFX is just increased in volume relative to the number of targets hit.

When I play as Maokai, I can tell when the sounds will happen and can brace myself for the (heavily) increased volumes of Q and E - Brush Explosion. But I've found myself lowering the SFX volume of the whole game when I'm not the Maokai in the game, because I can't pay full attention to the exact moment when the SFX are trigger and I don't feel like having my ears destroyed by basic game actions.

Q has a considerably short Missile Distance and a fast Missile Speed. Is it possible to remove all SFX for targets hit after the first, or reduce the relative volume? And if you find the time, checking the code for Maokai's bonus E effect to make sure it's not doing something screwy on the SFX side?

Hey Gear Kitty!

I'll have a chat with the appropriate audio folks for this and see if they have any thoughts on what we could do about it!

Hello semipriceysoap!

just a comment here, and this is coming from a S3 Kata main, I for one (as of 7.21 live) think the sounds for the Katarina skin is waaaaay to low. I rely a lot on hearing the sounds and it is screwing me up... I know it is also quit for the opponent, I've played a few games with friends and against them, they all say the same things "That q is too quiet" or "the ult went off? wtf?" and i personally agree with them. I would just turn up the in-game sounds, but compared to all the other sounds in league I feel like my ears would burst. but all in all, the volume of sound fx is the only problem i have with the skin.

Hey hey! Yeah, volume changes for Kat (to be louder on this skin) will be shipped out on 7.22 patch. That was my bad - we changed it right when things were switching from PBE -> Live so it's a little trickier when things are in progress. It is currently on PBE right now, if you have access!
in my opinion the sfx of her skin is still _way_ to quiet. even after "fix" (so 7.22). you can barely hear her especially her ult.

Praise the lord! Thanks a lot for an answer and for looking into it again!

In my opinion, the R SFX was really cool and i liked it. And if anything i thought the dagger pickup should sound even louder than it did. I think she's still suppose to sound deadly even thought she's a ghost now and i really think you nailed putting together Kats deadly SFX with the harrowing theme before that last update happened.

And thank you again semipriceysoap, you've been such a huge help with both feedback and making the skin feel good to play.

Yay, glad it's working better! Hmm, so she does have a passive reset sound, on this, base, and her other skins, but it can be tricky to hear sometimes. I'll chat with some folks on the audio team to get their thoughts, as it would affect more than just DS Kat.

I do hear the Passive SFX on her other skins but i think that DS Kat's SFX is too low on her Passive.

While we're on the topic, would it be possible to give PROJECT : Katarina her old Passive SFX back? I don't know why it ever got removed honestly. Atm it sounds like she used E instead of getting a reset. I know it might be a lot to ask but it's been bothering me ever since her rework.

Anyways, thanks a bunch for putting in the extra work to make the skin feel good to play. You're my new favorite Rioter! :)

D'aw, thanks :D That means a lot! 

Yeah, it's definitely more masked/harder to hear on this DS skin, I think the element I put on it. I chatted with a couple folks and we're going to discuss it, especially since it is a gameplay-related sound. Thanks for bringing this up! If things do change for this, I'll give you an update and we'll throw it into the patch notes!

Yay! Another chance for Kat to sound more deadly.
I think that hearing the SFX when she gets a reset is a huge factor in why Kat is fun to play. Especially when it's a bit louder like on her classic skin. And i definitely think that the sound can aid you gameplay wise.
This is why i also brought up her PROJECT skin. After the rework the tone of it drastically changed and it's harder to hear it in fights as well. If it's possible could you bring PROJECT : Katarina up in those discussions as well? I think that the old SFX both suited her skin better and was a better indicator in fights for both the player and the enemy.
Please, her SFX has to be fixed. It's horrible right now, her picking up dagger, Q and R are so quiet also, it has to be fixed.... I would fire these SFX makers.. :D
